strings.string: -XBMC JSONRPC TCP Port: This port can be configured in the as.xml - Default: 9090
-In System/Settings/Network/Services activate "Allow programs on this system
to control XBMC" and "Allow programs on other systems to control XBMC".
-TinyMediaManager/MediaElch users can set an optional watched-tag
in the nfo files to prevent inconsistencies.
